t: Buyer doesn't like item but has thrown packaging away and refuses to return it
s: I have sold a framed print for £9 and am informed by the buyer that the print is too dark and they don’t like it. I have informed them that they can receive a full refund if they return the item but they say they are unable to return it because they have thrown away the packaging it came in.
